inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He is now a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.

inclusion.criterion: no lesions or wounds in areas where acupressure applied
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: operated on under general anaesthesia pulse, blood pressure, body temperature and oxygen saturation values within normal range during the operation
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: pulse, blood pressure, body temperature and guarding on palpation

inclusion.criterion: no failure or disorder developing intraoperatively or postoperatively related to fluid-electrolyte balance, acid-base balance, or tissue perfusion
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: American Society of Anaesthesiologists (ASA) physical status IV
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: need for postoperative fasting according to the preoperative evaluation or intraoperative findings (eg, panperitonitis with intraperitoneal abscess)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: presence of any disease related to bleeding or a clotting disorder
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 17-year-old boy with severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, accompanied by nausea and vomiting. He was febrile with tenderness, rebound tenderness and guarding on palpation.
